about_the_game:
Distant Oceanic Getaway - A visual novel for sapphics!

The cruise ship’s horns blast. You’re going to be spending the next 10 days aboard the Distant Oceanic Cruise, a luxury vacation for sapphics only! Play as Maeve (customizable name), a heartbroken soul determined to move on from a cheating ex. There are only six other single sapphics on board— could one possibly be your soulmate? Only time will tell! After all, ‘tis the SEA-son for love!


You’ll have 10 days aboard the ship to explore, interact with characters, and have fun. Get drunk at the bar and pass out after having three drinks! Contemplate the meaning of life with a stranger you just met! There are endless choices for you to make and infinite opportunities for you to explore! And… perhaps even a secret hidden storyline for you to uncover? 



Your choices will shape your experience aboard the cruise. What kind of person will you be? Who will you fall in love with? Which ship will set sail? And where will you end up after these fateful 10 days…?







  • Choices That Matter: Experience over 20 unique endings based on your character’s decisions! Endless gameplay! Infinite replayability!
  • Customization Options: Your name and pronouns are customizable! There will also be two different voice options for Maeve: a feminine one and a gender-neutral one.
  • Stunning Original Art— Live2D Sprites and Gorgeous Illustrations: Become fully immersed in visuals that bring the story to life. You’ll feel like you’re literally aboard the Distant Oceanic Cruise! 
  • Original Soundtrack: Enjoy beautiful melodies from a selection of 7 different tracks that help set the mood!



  • Script, Program, and Live2D: Sine
  • Art: 清川老鼠
  • UI & Background: 春山
  • Music: 硯壹
  • Localization: Bobbu (English)
  • Proofreaders: 紫萍东郭（簡）,陳蔚嵐（繁）
  • Special thanks to Z貳

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains the following mature content:  non-explicit sexual scene, cursing, and depictions of alcohol and tobacco use.

legal_notice: This game contains the following mature content -  non-explicit sexual situations, profane language, and depictions of alcohol and tobacco use. Player discretion is advised.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 and up
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Distant Oceanic Getaway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11.

short_description: Distant Oceanic Getaway— A visual novel for sapphics! Will you be able to find true love while sailing the seven seas?
